channel.title: Json Ld on Boettiger Group
channel.description: Recent content in Json Ld on Boettiger Group

item.title: JSON-LD Vita exploration
item.description: Pure JSON vita <- readr::read_file("../../static/js/vita.json") jq(vita, '."@reverse".author[] | { year: .dateCreated, author: .author[] | [.givenName, .familyName] | join(" ") }') %>% combine() %>% fromJSON() ## year author ## 1 <NA> Getz ## 2 <NA> Marshall ## 3 <NA> Carlson ## 4 <NA> Giuggioli ## 5 <NA> Ryan ## 6 <NA> Roma√±ach ## 7 <NA> Boettiger ## 8 <NA> Chamberlain ## 9 <NA> Larsen ## 10 <NA> D'Odorico ## 11 <NA> O'Sullivan ## 12 2017-3-15 Stephanie E.
